<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/payments/{paymentId}/refunds"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



    Get a list of refunds for a payment in the Account.

    ### Permissions
    * `transaction:read`

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
